Self.Name: Show-WCAR-Activity-Table
Self.Description: Table view to show or edit multiple records.

Attribute.Name: onclientclick
Attribute.Value: javascript:ShowConfirm(event,'Confirm Re-Assign','Are you sure you want to re-assign this activity?','You can re-assign this activity in case you made a mistake.');

Attribute.Name: Text
Attribute.Value: ePortal Workflow Approval - CAR Workflow Reassign Tasks (South)
